comment: Best professor I've ever had. Truly wants you to learn and succeed. You have to complete your work and care about what you're doing, but you should if you're in this major anyway.

Dr. St. Pierre is an excellent professor and professional in the field of Health and Physical Education! He is a tough grader in this course, but it's meant for a reason - I recommend paying attention and taking heavy notes. Study study study!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Tough grader

comment: I had him for motor learning & development. Class was mostly lecture with some labs. Reinforces what you need to know. I thought some of the labs were kinda hard to write up but as long as you do it you get full credit. His test are a bit hard; they are mostly short answer, but his study guides cover everything you need to know. Nice guy.
By far my favorite professor at KSU! He makes class fun, improves your skills in any sport, and wants to see you succeed! I'm so excited to have him for a few more classes in the HPE program!
I took him during the summer. He is really nice guy. Easy tests, just read the power points and review the questions in the book online.Overall, I recommend him for this class.
Easy. I took the class during the summer semester. Test were easy as long as you review the information from the online book. Got out early everyday.
Absolutely incredible professor for golf. He improved my game dramatically!! Highly recommended and I guarantee you'll enjoy his class.

I took Professor Pierre for HPS 1000 & he was a great teacher! Very interested in the class & always helpful when you needed it. A few tests that are tricky but not bad if you study. & some labs that are easy. Take him if you can!

Great Professor! Took him during the summer for HPS 1000 and it was fun and easy.  He's a nice guy and loves teaching the class.  He's very helpful and the tests and quizzes aren't too hard.  We even got out of class early every day.
